tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at inspiring friendly troops, but weaker in melee. Best grouped with retinues of Melee Cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at inspiring friendly troops, but weaker in melee. Best grouped with retinues of Melee Cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at breaking through enemy troops; however, weaker against other generals. Best grouped with retinues of Shock Cavalry and Polearm Cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at breaking through enemy troops; however, weaker against other generals. Best grouped with retinues of Shock Cavalry and Polearm Cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at locking down enemy generals or holding a chokepoint for a long period of time. Best grouped with a retinue of Glaive Infantry and Melee Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Excels at locking down enemy generals or holding a chokepoint for a long period of time. Best grouped with a retinue of Glaive Infantry and Melee Infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Able to severely impair the efficiency of enemy units and generals in the battle. They also provide use of formations to nearby friendly units. However, they are extremely fragile. Best grouped with retinues of Ranged Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Able to severely impair the efficiency of enemy units and generals in the battle. They also provide use of formations to nearby friendly units. However, they are extremely fragile. Best grouped with retinues of Ranged Infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Best used to engage enemy generals; however, weaker against units. Best grouped with retinues of Spear Infantry and Glaive Infantry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Best used to engage enemy generals; however, weaker against units. Best grouped with retinues of Spear Infantry and Glaive Infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Excels at breaking down walls and igniting buildings, but extremely vulnerable against any attacks.
